              format: int
              minimum: 0
            unchanged:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
            skipped:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
            failed:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
            notImported:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
            notCreated:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
            notUpdated:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
          required:
            - created
            - updated
            - missing
            - unchanged
            - skipped
            - failed
            - notImported
            - notCreated
            - notUpdated
    MediaTrackerImportingProgress:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaTrackerImportSummary'
    MediaTrackerFsTraversalProgress:
      type: object
      properties:
        entries:
          type: object
          properties:
            skipped:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
            finished:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
        directories:
          type: object
          properties:
            finished:
              type: number
              format: int
              minimum: 0
    MediaTrackerDirTraversalRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        rootUrl:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedDirectoryUrl'
        maxDepth:
          type: number
          format: int
          minimum: 1
    MediaTrackerScanRequestBody:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaTrackerDirTraversalRequestBody'
    MediaTrackerFindUntrackedRequestBody:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaTrackerDirTraversalRequestBody'
    MediaTrackerScanSummary:
      type: object
      properties:
        current:
          type: number
          format: int
          minimum: 0
        added:
          type: number
          format: int
          minimum: 0
        modified:
          type: number
          format: int
          minimum: 0
        orphaned:
          type: number
          format: int
          minimum: 0
        skipped:
          type: number
          format: int
          minimum: 0
      required:
        - current
        - added
        - modified
        - orphaned
        - skipped
    MediaSourceVirtualFilePath:
      type: string
      minLength: 1
      example: 'album artist/album title/01 the first track.mp3'
    MediaContentPathKind:
      type: integer
      enum: [0, 1, 2, 3]
      description: |
        Defines how to resolve the location of media sources from the path:

          * 0 = Percent-encoded URI (case-sensitive)
          * 1 = Percent-encoded URL (case-sensitive)
          * 2 = Percent-encoded URL with the scheme "file" (case-sensitive)
          * 3 = Virtual, relative file path with '/' as path separator

        For collections of local files option 3 is the recommended choice.
        The accompanying `file://` URL is stored as part of the media source
        configuration in the collection.
    MediaContentPath:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedUri'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedUrl'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaSourceVirtualFilePath'
    MediaTrackerScanResponseBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        rootUrl:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedDirectoryUrl'
        rootPath:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaContentPath'
        completion:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaTrackerCompletion'
        summary:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaTrackerScanSummary'
      required:
        - rootUrl
        - rootPath
        - completion
        - summary
    MediaTrackerFindUntrackedResponseBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        rootUrl:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedDirectoryUrl'
        rootPath:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaContentPath'
        completion:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaTrackerCompletion'
        contentPaths:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaContentPath'
      required:
        - rootUrl
        - rootPath
        - completion
        - contentPaths
    PercentEncodedUri:
      type: string
      minLength: 1
      example: file:///home/user/Music/album%20artist/album%20title/01%20the%20first%20track.mp3
      description: |
        A percent-encoded URI (RFC 3986).
    PercentEncodedDirectoryUrl:
      description: |
        A percent-encoded URL with scheme `file` that represents a directory path
        on the local file system.
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedUrl'
      example: file:///home/user/Music/
    PercentEncodedUrl:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedUri'
    RelocateCollectedMediaSourcesRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        oldPathPrefix:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaSourceVirtualFilePath'
        newPathPrefix:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MediaSourceVirtualFilePath'
      required:
        - oldPathPrefix
        - newPathPrefix
    RelocateCollectedMediaSourcesResponseBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        replacedCount:
          type: number
          format: uint64
      required:
        - replacedCount
    ReplaceCollectedTrackMode:
      type: string
      enum:
        - create-only
        - update-only
        - update-or-create
      example: update-or-create
      default: update-or-create
    ReplaceCollectedTracksRequestBody:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Track'
    ImportAndReplaceCollectedTracksRequestBody:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedUri'
    ReplaceCollectedTracksResponseBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        created:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrackEntity'
        updated:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrackEntity'
        unchanged:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PercentEncodedUri'
        notCreated:
